member.name: T:RestApiSample.Controllers.ContosoController
member.summary: This controller is the primary entry point for all Contoso object calls

member.name: M:RestApiSample.Controllers.ContosoController.CreateContosoAsync(ContosoRest.Models.Domain.ContosoModel)
member.returns: the Id of the created or 'Bad Request' if the call fails.

member.name: M:RestApiSample.Controllers.ContosoController.GetContosoAsync(System.Int32)
member.param: The Id of the item to retrieve.

member.name: M:RestApiSample.Controllers.ContosoController.UpdateContosoAsync(ContosoRest.Models.Domain.ContosoModel)
member.param: The item, containing the changes, to update.
member.returns: OK if successful, 'Not Found' if the item's id was not found, or 'Bad Request' if the call fails.

member.name: M:RestApiSample.Controllers.ContosoController.DeleteContosoAsync(System.Int32)
member.param: The Id of the item to delete.
member.returns: 'No Content'(success) if successful, 'Not Found' if the item's id was not found, or Bad Request if the call fails.
